module.name: agentDetector
module.description: Module based on \ref kinectClient "Kinect Wrapper Client" that track and recognize people.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long:
Module based on \ref kinectClient "Kinect Wrapper Client" that track and recognize people. This module receives information from the Kinect wrapper, performs facial identification and convert joints to the iCub referential.
It requires the \ref kinectServer an OPC and RFH running.
